questions.question: This technology is used to manage and secure mobile devices within an organization.
This term refers to the practice of allowing employees to use their personal devices for work purposes.
questions.answer: What is Bring Your Own Device (BYOD)?

questions.question: This feature of MDM allows administrators to remotely wipe data from a lost or stolen device.
This term refers to the process of enrolling a mobile device into an MDM system for management and security.
This type of policy in MDM restricts the use of certain applications or features on managed devices.
questions.answer: What is an App Restriction Policy?
